`ecoPointXAI` provides an end-to-end, explainable 3D forest analytics pipeline built for LiDAR point cloud data.  
It combines **voxel-based ecological feature engineering**, **PointNet deep learning**, and **explainability methods** (SHAP, gradients) to model, visualize, and interpret forest canopy structure in a transparent and reproducible way.

## âœ¨ Key Features

- ğŸ“¦ **Voxelization & Preprocessing** â€” Convert LiDAR point clouds into 3D voxel grids.
- ğŸŒ² **Ecological Metrics** â€” Compute canopy height, cover, and structural complexity.
- ğŸ§  **Deep Learning (PointNet)** â€” Train explainable 3D neural models on voxelized features.
- ğŸ” **Explainability** â€” Apply SHAP or gradient-based methods to interpret model behavior.
- ğŸ¨ **Visualization Tools** â€” Interactive 3D mapping and metric visualization for ecological insights.
